description: From Ancient Greek εὔξενος (eúxenos, “friendly to strangers, hospitable”) + -ite.

entries.meaning: (mineralogy) A dark brown lustrous mineral that is a mixed oxide of cerium, erbium, titanium, uranium, yttrium and other more common metals, with the chemical formula (Y,Ca,Ce,U,Th)(Nb,Ta,Ti)2O6.
